q: CEO reins back to co-founder Larry Page came as a shock, but with the company's aura of invincibility fading, and its core business showing signs of age, the time was right for a change. There was an example every hour, of how triumvirate decision-making by Eric Schmidt , Larry Page , and co-founder Segrey Brin was hurting the company, Eric Schmidt said. I didn't want to be overaggressive. I just wanted to let my teammates do what they had to do early in the game because they( Grizzlies) were taking away some of the shots I wanted by zoning up. My teammates held the fort, and then when I got an opportunity, I just tried to make the best of it. Allen Iverson made 10-of-24 shots, including 4-of-7 3-pointers. Although Simon Cowell is fighting for the Geordie to be involved, it's reported that bosses would prefer a big American star like Rihanna or Katy Perry . A naughty little source told the Sun: Everyone thinks Cheryl has the judging job on US X Factor in the bag.`` The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced.`` They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. `` Keine Frage, Larry Page ist bereit, das Unternehmen zu f?hren.'' Der unternehmerische Nachwuchs Larry Page hatte zehn Jahre lang Zeit, sich auf seine Rolle vorzubereiten. Er konnte Eric Schmidt jeden Tag ber die Schulter gucken. Ich bin sicher, dass er einen fantastischen Job machen wird , sagt Eric Schmidt . Der bergang von Eric Schmidt zu Larry Page sei schon lange innerhalb des F?hrungszirkels diskutiert worden, hei?t es aus inneren Kreisen des Konzerns.
